job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
The team works on multiple dimensions
Unique opportunity to work with open source.
Work on Security, Onboarding and platform integrations with cutting edge Cloud security features
Key responsibilities include
Work on developing code samples in the areas of mTLS and authentication
Work on onboarding security features
Mandatory
Experienced with an open-source software development environment. - Familiar with Golang - Bachelors in Engineering, Computer Science is preferred, or equivalence of industry experience
Desired
Experience in the following domain areas is a plus: - Networking - Authentication/Identity - API Client development
